channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report E-2024040334
item.description:
Report E-2024040334

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-17T15:16:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-13
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics contacted ERTS regarding one bottle of Rooto Professional Liquid Drain Opener leaking onto the trailer floor as a result of improper loading / inadequate preparation for transportation. A Contractor was dispatched and neutralized the release along with the damaged product using soda ash. The spill was cleaned-up with oil-dry. Two 15-gallon DFâ€™s were generated for waste disposal containing the neutralized product, spent absorbents, and PPE. No storm-drains, waterways, or soil were impacted by this incident.

  • City: BROOMFIELD

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: X-2024040437: SequenceEvent: This hazmat was discovered leaking during preload. The pkg was placed in red tote and plastic bag and stored in QA1. DescribePack: One of the caps leaked. There is some brown liquid of the label of the bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed in a plastic bag and red tote. X-2024040441: SequenceEvent: This hazmat was discovered leaking during preload. The hazmat was placed in a red tote and plastic bag and stored in QA1. DescribePack: I found yellowish brown residue on a tag on the glass bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed in a red tote and plastic bag.

item.title: Report X-2024040683
item.description:
Report X-2024040683

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-16T18:13:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-10
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg. came to QA on IC belt wet and QA placed inside a lined tote and took to hazmat cage. DescribePack: Closures came loose which caused outer carton to tear and get wet and inner bottles were soiled as well. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed inside a lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2024040367
item.description:
Report X-2024040367

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-16T18:13:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-29
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jugs in sealed plastic bags inside corrugated inner and outer cartons with shredded cardboard filler. No arrows nor hazard markings on exterior. Loose cap on one jug allowed leakage which soiled jugs and damaged cartons. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2024040375
item.description:
Report X-2024040375

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-16T18:13:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-29
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic bottles with snap-on lids in corrugated carton. Hazard markings hidden between cartons. Internal pressure burst seals under some lids, allowing leakage which damaged cartons. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2024040336
item.description:
Report X-2024040336

  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damage was discovered in the unload. The unload manager called upon an Admin for assistance in containing the shipment. DescribePack: The leak stems from the jerrican cap/plug. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The responding Admin contained the shipment in a hazardous materials spill tote and transported it to the hazmat cage for processing.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Plastic drum was found with the exterior wet. Package was moved from the spill, the spill was contained, and the package was contained in a safe drum. DescribePack: The lid became lose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was moved from the spill, the spill was contained, and the package was contained in a safe drum.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damage was discovered in the unload. The unload manager called out to an Admin for assistance in containing the leakage. DescribePack: The jerrican cap/lid is either loose or defective since the leakage stems from the cap/lid. item.title: Report X-2024040259
item.description:
Report X-2024040259

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-15T15:12:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-26
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to the load side for a spill that happened in trailer and when QA arrived pkg. was leaking out all over ground inside trailer and it damaged a whole tire. DescribePack: Pkg. was loaded on its side and the closures came loose on 2 bottles and liquid leaked out soiling outer carton and inner bottles DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: trailer was taken to LC2 by QA and QA placed neutralizer on spill and red tagged trailer.
